content.text: Match ends, Verona 1, Feyenoord 0.
Second Half ends, Verona 1, Feyenoord 0.
Foul by Jordy Clasie (Feyenoord).
Daniele Cacia (Verona) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. Michelangelo Albertazzi (Verona) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Alessandro Sgrigna with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Verona. Conceded by Bruno Martins Indi.
Corner,  Feyenoord. Conceded by Simon Laner.
